Oops! There's a typo in the torrent description - episode 7 is called Jaynestown, not Jaynesdown. The name of the actual file is spelled correctly, though.
"Our Mrs. Reynolds" is supposed to have an audio commentary, which seems to be missing from this. Any chance you can rip the commentary and upload it somewhere?

I'd like to help you out, squall, but I can't. I just re-checked the DVD and the episode doesn't have a commentary track. Maybe there's a different version of the series, which has a commentary for 'Our Mrs. Reynolds?'
I misread, that commentary is apparently BluRay only. Sorry for the bother. :)
